snippet: The 2014 World Cup in Brazil will be the first to offer special seats for obese fans.
abstract: Brazil will be first host country to offer special seats for obese fans during the 2014 World Cup.
lead_paragraph: The 2014 World Cup in Brazil will be the first to offer special seats for obese fans.

headline.seo: World Cup to Offer Special Seats for Larger Fans
headline.main: World Cup to Offer Special Seats for Larger Fans
